text: Antonius "Toon" Geurts (29 February 1932 - 6 October 2017) was a Dutch sprint canoer. He was most successful in the K-2 1000 m event, in which he finished in seventh, second and fourth place at the 1960, 1964 and 1968 Olympics, respectively. He won silver at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo. He was born in Veldhoven, the Netherlands. Geurts died in The Hague, the Netherlands on 6 October 2017 at the age of 85.Olympische medaillewinnaar Antoon Geurts uit Veldhoven overleden ==References== ==Other websites== *Sports-reference.com profile Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Netherlands Category:Sportspeople from North Brabant
title: Toon Geurts
